name: Ready, HANDHELD!
description:
“Ready, HANDHELD!”

is a game were you play as a red alien in a platformer on handheld gaming device, except the battery on your handheld is running out and you must finish your old school platforming adventure, before shutdown.

this game is approx. 8 - 5 min long 

Enjoy!

made for ludum dare 39

LD39 page : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/$36751

source code: https://goo.gl/P6d2N5
